briefdescription.para: Symbol specifying offset between address of TASK/EVENT register and address of associated SUBSCRIBE/PUBLISH register.

detaileddescription.para: Start the RSSI and take one single sample of the receive signal strength.
Start the Energy Detect measurement used in IEEE 802.15.4 mode.
Start the Clear Channel Assessment used in IEEE 802.15.4 mode.

briefdescription.para: RADIO tasks.

detaileddescription.para: Radio has ramped up and is ready to be started.
A device address match occurred on the last received packet.
No device address match occurred on the last received packet.
Sampling of receive signal strength complete.
Bit counter reached bit count value.
The sampling of Energy Detection has stopped.
Wireless medium in idle - clear to send.
Wireless medium busy - do not send.
Ble_LR CI field received, receive mode is changed from Ble_LR125Kbit to Ble_LR500Kbit.
RADIO has ramped up and is ready to be started TX path.
RADIO has ramped up and is ready to be started RX path.
Generated in Ble_LR125Kbit, Ble_LR500Kbit and BleIeee802154_250Kbit modes when last bit is sent on the air.
Generated in Ble_LR125Kbit, Ble_LR500Kbit and BleIeee802154_250Kbit modes when possible preamble has been received.

briefdescription.para: RADIO events.
RADIO interrupts.

detaileddescription.para: Shortcut between READY event and START task.
Shortcut between END event and DISABLE task.
Shortcut between DISABLED event and TXEN task.
Shortcut between DISABLED event and RXEN task.
Shortcut between ADDRESS event and RSSISTART task.
Shortcut between END event and START task.
Shortcut between ADDRESS event and BCSTART task.
Shortcut between DISABLED event and RSSISTOP task.
Shortcut between RXREADY event and CCASTART task.
Shortcut between CCAIDLE event and TXEN task.
Shortcut between CCABUSY event and DISABLE task.
Shortcut between FRAMESTART event and BCSTART task.
Shortcut between READY event and EDSTART task.
Shortcut between EDEND event and DISABLE task.
Shortcut between CCAIDLE event and STOP task.
Shortcut between TXREADY event and START task.
Shortcut between RXREADY event and START task.
Shortcut between PHYEND event and DISABLE task.
Shortcut between PHYEND event and START task.

briefdescription.para: RADIO shortcuts.

detaileddescription.para: Energy Above Threshold. Will report busy whenever energy is detected above set threshold.
Carrier Seen. Will report busy whenever compliant IEEE 802.15.4 signal is seen.
Energy Above Threshold AND Carrier Seen.
Energy Above Threshold OR Carrier Seen.
Energy Above Threshold test mode that will abort when first ED measurement over threshold is seen. No averaging.

briefdescription.para: RADIO Clear Channel Assessment modes.

detaileddescription.para: No operations are going on inside the radio and the power consumption is at a minimum.
The radio is ramping up and preparing for reception.
The radio is ready for reception to start.
The radio is disabling the receiver.
The radio is ramping up and preparing for transmission.
The radio is ready for transmission to start.
The radio is transmitting a packet.
The radio is disabling the transmitter.

briefdescription.para: Types of RADIO states.
Types of RADIO TX power.

detaileddescription.para: Bluetooth Low Energy Long range 125 kbit/s TX, 125 kbit/s and 500 kbit/s RX
Bluetooth Low Energy Long range 500 kbit/s TX, 125 kbit/s and 500 kbit/s RX

briefdescription.para: Types of RADIO modes (data rate and modulation).

detaileddescription.para: Preamble - used for BTLE Long Range.

briefdescription.para: Types of preamble length.

detaileddescription.para: CRC calculation does not include address field.

CRC calculation starting at first byte after S1 field.

briefdescription.para: Types of CRC calculatons regarding address.
Direction Finding operation modes.
States of Direction Finding switching state machine.
States of Direction Finding sampling state machine.
Valid ranges of CTE time, expressed in 8 us units.
Spacing between samples for the samples in the switching period.

detaileddescription.para: AoA/AoD procedure triggered at end of CRC.
Antenna switching/sampling done in the packet payload.

briefdescription.para: State when CTE extension is added and antenna switching/sampling is done.

Interval between samples.

detaileddescription.para: Complex samples in I and Q.
Complex samples as magnitude and phase.

Mode of CCA.

Limit of occurances above Correlator Threshold. When not equal to zero the correlator based signal detect is enabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the specified GPIO pin for antenna control.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pin number.
Position of the pin in the switching pattern configured with nrf_radio_dfe_pattern_add() or nrf_radio_dfe_patterns_add().

briefdescription.para: Function for adding single pattern to the array of GPIO patterns for antenna control.

detaileddescription.para: The GPIO pattern array size is 40 entries. This function configures single pattern consisting of 8 pins. To set subsequent pattern, call this function again. To get total number of currently configured patterns use nrf_radio_dfe_pattern_cnt_get(). To clear the array of GPIO patterns use nrf_radio_dfe_pattern_clear().

simplesect.para: A minimum number of 3 patterns must be written.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Bitmask specifying pins to be used in this switching pattern. Each bit corresponds to the index of the pin configured with nrf_radio_dfe_pattern_pin_set().

briefdescription.para: Function for adding multiple patterns to the array of GPIO patterns for antenna control.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the array of bitmasks specifying pins to be used in subsequent switching patterns.
Bitmask array length.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting number of currently configured GPIO patterns for antenna control.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing all of the currently configured GPIO patterns for antenna control.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Each sample or pair is stored on a 32-bit word.

Pointer to the buffer for storing IQ samples or magnitude and phase of the samples.
Maximum number of samples to receive.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the number of stored IQ samples or magnitude and phase pairs of the samples during last transaction.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
of samples.
